thread.title: Lovely hotel in the hub of Stellenbosch
thread.title_full: Lovely hotel in the hub of Stellenbosch - Review of Coopmanhuijs Boutique Hotel & Spa, Stellenbosch, South Africa - TripAdvisor

author: MES196
title: Lovely hotel in the hub of Stellenbosch
text:
This hotel is situated right among the best restaurants, coffee shops and pubs in Stellenbosch. The hotel has a lovely restaurant and serves a beautiful breakfast with a wide spread. The rooms are lovely although not very spacious. Most rooms are upstairs and the lift is quite slow.
Room Tip: Ask for a ground floor room if you do not like steps. Otherwise the rooms overlooking the pool with... See more room tips
